entry.title: åˆ¤æ–­å¤§ç«¯ä¸å°ç«¯æ¨¡å¼
entry.content:
typedef struct {
    uint16_t h1:4;
    uint16_t h2:4;
    uint16_t h3:4;
    uint16_t h4:4;
} HalfByte;

typedef union {
    uint16_t half_word;
    uint8_t low_addr_byte;
} ShareLowAddrByte;

/*
 å¦‚æœæ˜¯å°ç«¯ï¼ˆæ¯”ç‰¹åºï¼‰æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œåˆ™è¾“å‡ºç»“æœä¸ºï¼š
    h1 = 04
    h2 = 03
    h3 = 02
    h4 = 01
    low addr byte: 34
 å¦‚æœæ˜¯å¤§ç«¯ï¼ˆç½‘ç»œå­—èŠ‚åºï¼‰æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œåˆ™è¾“å‡ºç»“æœä¸ºï¼š
    h1 = 01
    h2 = 02
    h3 = 03
    h4 = 04
    low addr byte: 12
*/
void VerifyEndian(void) {
    uint16_t data = 0x1234;
    HalfByte *hb = (HalfByte *)&data;
    ShareLowAddrByte *lb = (ShareLowAddrByte)&data;
    printf("h1 = %02Xr\n", hb->h1);
    printf("h2 = %02X\r\n", hb->h2);
    printf("h3 = %02X\r\n", hb->h3);
    printf("h4 = %02X\r\n", hb->h4);

    printf("low addr byte: %02X\r\n", lb->low_addr_byte);
}
